review_text: I travel to Odessa for hospital work monthly and so this was a very convenient location relative to the hospital. It is surprisingly quiet for a downtown spot. I slept in the king sized bedroom - the bed is great and there are black out curtains for daytime sleeping. The place is very clean. There is a full kitchen if you like to cook , but you will have to buy all your own spices, oils etc as there aren’t any stocked. If you are a long term guest, you will need to use a laundromat as there is no washer or dryer here , but it is otherwise a perfect place to stay , especially if you’re at one of the local hospitals. Dora was quick to respond to messages at first, but once I suggested that adding laundry to the place would be a big boost to the cottage , I did not hear from her. Her husband was considerate in checking in with me at my check out day , though. And they left two gallons of water for me , which was really thoughtful. It was a really comfy stay overall and would recommend it. I felt safe there , too.

review_text:
The pictures are accurate except for the front. The front porch is waaay prettier in person :). It looks like a little dessert oasis. I traveled here for work and I'm glad I went with this option over the others.
Even though it's located in between businesses, it still feels secluded, private and safe. The home is walking distance to a lot but given the heat and my desire to not melt, I opted for ubereats which found the home easily.
Like goldilocks, I tried all of the beds and they are all perfect! My children, who are self proclaimed "mattress connoisseurs", typically complain about the beds but I didn't hear a peep about these which says a lot.
I did not cook this trip but had I wanted to, I had everything I would need to prepare a decent meal. There's not a dishwasher so if you decide to cook, prepare to handwash the good ole fashioned way.
Both bathrooms offered ample towels and body soap. The temperature and water pressure are virtually perfect.
Communication with the host was perfect! I believe the response time averaged about 20 min which is almost unheard of! I had a mini meltdown after having a flat THE DAY of check out (talk about bad luck) and the host assisted in helping me find help.
You will not be disappointed with your stay here.

This was very disappointing as our budget didn't allow for another stay else where. This home was perfect. Overall one of the best homes we’ve stayed in. This home exceeded our expectations to the fullest. From the start Crystal responded quick. She most certainly thought of it all. We didn’t go needing a thing. Top host: CRYSTAL!
Upon arrival the home smells so clean and lovely. The decor is beautiful. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook. Let’s talk about how freaking cool the fridge was! I mean it played pandora 😊. The stove was also super upscale and fancy. The milk, beer, and snacks were cherries on top!

The living room area was so comfy. I fell in love with this couch! We lounged and netflixed for an entire day. The tv is MASSIVE and has Netflix, Hulu and other apps. There are lounging blankets provided. The coffee-table/foosball table was that extra touch of coolness.
Every bedroom had a tv with WiFi and Netflix connected. Each room was also was super cozy and homey.
The bathrooms and showers were super clean with enough towels, toothpaste, face wipes, mouthwash, and shampoo.
The washer and dryer are huge and wash super quickly. Thank for the softener and dryer sheets.
Although, the rules did not require you take your shoes off throughout the home, we did. This home is sooo clean and lovely. It’s not often my husband just relaxes, but he did just that. So thank you again Crystal for your kind hospitality and for sharing this amazing home. We will certainly stay here again and highly recommend to everyone.
